mapper.select: SELECT TR_DT , ARDY_BZEP_NO , FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN , TR_SN , RNDR_DCD , SPC_DEP_ITEM_KND_CD , SPC_WDR_ITEM_KND_CD , SYNS_TEXT , TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO , RNDR_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN RNDR_DCD = 1 THEN RNDR_AMT WHEN RNDR_DCD = 2 THEN -RNDR_AMT ELSE 0 END) OVER( ORDER BY TR_DT , RNDR_DCD ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) AS RNDR_BLCE , ISTT_CD , ACNO , SORT_NO , RMRK FROM IBIMS902B WHERE 1=1 AND FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = #{fincExcuRqsSn} ORDER BY TR_DT , RNDR_DCD;

SELECT A.TR_DT /* 거래일자 */ , A.ARDY_BZEP_NO /* 기업체번호 */ , A.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN /* 자금집행신청일련번호 */ , A.TR_SN /* 거래일련번호 */ , A.TR_TM /* 거래시간 */ , A.RNDR_DCD /* 입출금구분코드 */ , A.SPC_DEP_ITEM_KND_CD /* SPC입금항목종류코드 */ , A.SPC_WDR_ITEM_KND_CD /* SPC출금항목종류코드 */ , A.SYNS_TEXT /* 적요내용 */ , A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO /* 거래상대방기업체번호 */ , ( SELECT ENTP_NM FROM IBIMS010B WHERE ARDY_BZEP_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO ) AS TR_OTHR_NM /*거래상대방명*/ , A.RNDR_AMT /* 입출금금액 */ , A.ISTT_CD /* 기관코드 */ , ( SELECT FNLT_NM FROM IBIMS992B WHERE 1=1 AND FNLT_CD = A.ISTT_CD ) AS isttNm /* 기관명 */ , A.ACNO /* 계좌번호 */ , A.RMRK /* 비고 */ FROM IBIMS902B A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ARDY_BZEP_NO = #{ardyBzepNo} AND A.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = #{fincExcuRqsSn} AND A.RNDR_DCD = '1'

SELECT A.TR_DT /* 거래일자 */ , A.ARDY_BZEP_NO /* 기업체번호 */ , A.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN /* 자금집행신청일련번호 */ , A.TR_SN /* 거래일련번호 */ , A.RNDR_DCD /* 입출금구분코드 */ , A.SPC_DEP_ITEM_KND_CD /* SPC입금항목종류코드 */ , A.SPC_WDR_ITEM_KND_CD /* SPC출금항목종류코드 */ , A.SYNS_TEXT /* 적요내용 */ , A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO /* 거래상대방기업체번호 */ , ( SELECT ENTP_NM FROM IBIMS010B WHERE ARDY_BZEP_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO ) AS TR_OTHR_NM /*거래상대방명*/ , A.RNDR_AMT /* 입출금금액 */ , A.ISTT_CD /* 기관코드 */ , ( SELECT FNLT_NM FROM IBIMS992B WHERE 1=1 AND FNLT_CD = A.ISTT_CD ) AS isttNm /* 기관명 */ , A.ACNO /* 계좌번호 */ , A.RMRK /* 비고 */ FROM IBIMS902B A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ARDY_BZEP_NO = #{ardyBzepNo} AND A.FINC_EXCU_RQS_SN = #{fincExcuRqsSn} AND A.RNDR_DCD = '2'
